alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 7:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Camden, Glynn, central Brantley and northeastern Charlton Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 751 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Everett to near Waynesville to near Fort Mudge. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Dock Junction, Hickox, Country Club Estates, Thalmann, Waynesville, Atkinson and Boys Estate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton
